required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on Cardiovascular Health, Nutrition and Physical Functioning in Older Adults in Spain
clinical_study.official_title: Study on Cardiovascular Health, Nutrition and Physical Functioning in Older Adults in Spain (Seniors-ENRICA II)

brief_summary.textblock: Population aging makes it necessary to identify factors related to unhealthy aging. The purpose of this study is to examine the association between ideal cardiovascular health, diet and other lifestyles and biological risk factors (either clasical or emergent) and the risk of physical and cognitive function impairment and mortality in a cohort of community-living individuals aged 65 years and over.

primary_outcome.description: Chair Sit and Reach test
Back Scratch test
Short Physical Performance Battery (SPPB): Balance test
Short Physical Performance Battery (SPPB): Gait Speed test

primary_outcome.measure: Functional limitations on strength of legs
primary_outcome.description: Short Physical Performance Battery (SPPB): Chair Stand test

primary_outcome.measure: Functional limitations on strength of hands
primary_outcome.description: Hydraulic hand dynamometer (Jamar Plus +)

primary_outcome.measure: Functional limitations on activities of daily living
primary_outcome.description: Activities of Daily Living (ADLs) test

primary_outcome.measure: Functional limitations on instrumental activities of daily living
primary_outcome.description: Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADLs) test
Pocket Smell test
NIH Tool Box Taste test
Audiometry
Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE)

primary_outcome.measure: Executive function limitations on working memory
primary_outcome.description: Digits Forward test (WAIS-III),

primary_outcome.measure: Executive function limitations on programmed motor tasks
primary_outcome.description: Three Hand Position test of Luria

primary_outcome.measure: Executive function limitations on motor response control
primary_outcome.description: GO-NO-GO test.
Seven Minute Screen (orientation, memory, clock drawing, verbal fluency)
Fried criteria
From the question: "How many times have you fallen down since the last interview? a) Number of falls; b) Number of injurious falls; c) Number of falls with fracture

primary_outcome.measure: Arterial stiffness estimated by pulse wave velocity (PWV)
primary_outcome.description: Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitor using the oscillometric method (Mobil-O-Graph PWA) to estimate PWV (m/s) over a 24 hours period

primary_outcome.measure: Arterial stiffness estimated by central sistolic blood pressure (CSBP)
primary_outcome.description: Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitor using the oscillometric method (Mobil-O-Graph PWA) to estimate CSBP (mmHg) over a 24 hours period

primary_outcome.measure: Arterial stiffness estimated by augmentation index (AI)
primary_outcome.description: Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitor using the oscillometric method (Mobil-O-Graph PWA) to estimate AI (%) over a 24 hours period
Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitor using the oscillometric method (Mobil-O-Graph PWA) to estimate brachial blood pressure (systolic and diastolic) (mmHg) over a 24 hours period
From the National Institute of Statistics of Spain

study_pop.textblock: Community-living individuals in the region of Madrid, Spain, aged 65 years or older.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Non-institutionalized residents in the region of Madrid, Spain.
- 65 years and over
Exclusion Criteria:
- None

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Preventive Medicine and Public Health. Universidad Autónoma de Madrid
Department of Preventive Medicine and Public Health. Universidad Autónoma de Madrid

facility.name: Department of Preventive Medicine and Public Health. Universidad Autonoma de Madrid

responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor of Preventive Medicine and Public Health
